name: Stefania
description:
Jeu narratif créé pour le RPG Maker Jam, du 18 au 21 août 2017, organisé par Aurélien Dos Santos.

Sorry english-speakers, I'd take quite some time to translate everything, and if you don't understand French you won't udnerstand the game. I might do it in the future, but in the mean time check out the other submissions for the jam ! :)
